name: ESTATE of Louis A. HICKS v. DANA CORPORATION, et al. Appeal of Dana Corporation; Estate of Louis A. Hicks v. Dana Corporation, et al. Appeal of John Crane, Inc., f/k/a Crane Packing
name_abbreviation: Estate of Hicks v. Dana Corp.

parties: ESTATE of Louis A. HICKS v. DANA CORPORATION, et al. Appeal of Dana Corporation. Estate of Louis A. Hicks v. Dana Corporation, et al. Appeal of John Crane, Inc., f/k/a Crane Packing.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of September, 2006, it is hereby ordered that the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is affirmed as to the issue of the unconstitutionality of Act 57.
Appellants’ ancillary issues are transferred to the Superior Court. See Harrington v. Commonwealth, Dep’t of Transp., 563 Pa. 565, 763 A.2d 386, 393 (2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
909 A.2d 298
ESTATE of Louis A. HICKS v. DANA CORPORATION, et al. Appeal of Dana Corporation. Estate of Louis A. Hicks v. Dana Corporation, et al. Appeal of John Crane, Inc., f/k/a Crane Packing.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 27, 2006.
